traits.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: Spellix has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

actions.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk ms} +5 to hit (with advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d8 damage) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
entries: Ranged Spell atk +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 5 (1d10 damage) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Spellix's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
